sentences.en: "But Ian's such a simpleton", she laughed.
sentences.cn: “可是伊恩太傻了，”她笑着说道。

sentences.en: Be the simpleton to oneself, don't understand and then ask, you will learn of more.
sentences.cn: 把自己当傻瓜, 不懂就问, 你会学的更多.

sentences.en: He looked at me as if I were a simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他看着我的样子就好像我是个傻子。

sentences.en: He tells of a Cuban fisherman who is a simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他讲的是个愚蠢的古巴渔民.

sentences.en: He was a lightweight, a political simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他是个无名之辈，头脑简单的政客。

sentences.en: Is he, you know, like some kind of weird simpleton?
sentences.cn: 那个谁，你知道吗，像古怪的傻子似的是谁？

sentences.en: Nay, impatience kills the fool and indignation slays the simpleton.
sentences.cn: 的确, 忧愤杀死愚人,怒火使痴者丧生.

sentences.en: She behaves perfectly sensibly with her children, but with her dog she becomes a drooling simpleton.
sentences.cn: 她对待孩子非常理智, 但在自己的爱犬面前,却变成了傻话连篇的白痴.

sentences.en: She instantly felt that she was the greatest simpleton in the world unaccountable and absurd!
sentences.cn: 她当即感到她是世界上最大的笨蛋,真是荒唐至极,不可思议.

sentences.en: Small simpleton, you really good lovely.
sentences.cn: 小笨蛋, 您真正地好可爱.

sentences.en: Surely vexation slays the fool, And jealousy kills the simpleton.
sentences.cn: 2烦恼的确杀死愚妄人, 嫉妒害死痴呆人.

sentences.en: The simpleton wants to be with you together forever!
sentences.cn: 傻瓜想要永远和你在一起!
最笨的呆子也知道这点.

sentences.en: You big simpleton, how can anyone deceive the eye.
sentences.cn: 你这个大傻瓜, 谁能够骗眼睛呢?

trans.tran_en: someone who has a very low level of intelligence
